tool_description:
IceHockeyApi offers you real time hockey livescore, tables, statistics, fixtures and results for more than 70 ice hockey leagues, cups and tournaments.
For increased rates and more sports, please look at: https://rapidapi.com/fluis.lacasse/api/allsportsapi2/
name: IceHockeyApi
title: IceHockeyApi

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Perform a search for players, teams, and tournaments in Ice Hockey using the provided search term.

required_parameters.name: term
required_parameters.description: The search term to use for finding players, teams, and tournaments.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://icehockeyapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/ice-hockey/search/nhl"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "icehockeyapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://icehockeyapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/ice-hockey/search/{term}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "icehockeyapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
